subtasks.title: 准备项目文档
subtasks.description: Create and finalize project documentation including requirements, scope, and deliverables

subtasks.title: 设计系统架构
subtasks.description: Design and finalize the system architecture including components, interactions, and technical specifications

subtasks.title: 实现用户认证功能
subtasks.description: Implement and test user authentication functionality including registration, login, password reset, and security measures

subtasks.title: 编写单元测试
subtasks.description: Write and execute unit tests for the user authentication functionality to verify code correctness and edge cases

subtasks.title: 部署到测试环境
subtasks.description: Deploy the application to the test environment for initial testing and validation
